revisions.rev:
This is the discography of [[United States|American]] [[R&B]]/[[soul music|soul]]/[[pop music|pop]] vocal [[girl group]] [[The Pointer Sisters]]. The group made sixteen trips to ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]''{{'}}s top forty singles chart with a total of twenty-seven singles registered altogether on the [[Billboard Hot 100]], and thirty registered on ''Billboard'''s Hot Soul/Black/R&B Singles Chart. Seven of those singles reached the top ten singles chart on the Hot 100 and five of those hit the top five. {{Infobox Artist Discography |Artist = [[The Pointer Sisters]] |Image = |Caption = |Studio = 15 |Studio link = Albums |Live = 3 |Soundtrack = 1 |Compilation = 11 |Video = |Tribute = |EP = |Singles = 51 |Music videos = |B-sides = |}} ==Albums== ===Studio albums=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! rowspan="2"| Year ! rowspan="2"| Album ! colspan="7"|Chart positions{{cite web|url=http://www.billboard.com/#/artist/the-pointer-sisters/chart-history/5432|title=US Charts > The Pointer Sisters|publisher=''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]''|accessdate=2011-11-13}}{{cite web|url={{Allmusic|class=artist|id=p5161/charts-awards|pure_url=yes}}|title=US Album Charts > The Pointer Sisters|publisher=[[Allmusic]]|accessdate=2011-11-14}} ! rowspan="2"| [[Music recording sales certification|Certifications]]
